alert.note: Alert for Adams; Bowman; Hettinger; Slope (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 21 at 1:58PM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM WEDNESDAY TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Slope, Hettinger, Bowman, and Adams counties. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 PM MST this evening. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 5 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Thursday. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 2 PM Wednesday to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous travel due to snow and blowing snow reducing visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills will cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while outside. Wear appropriate winter clothing. Slow down and use caution while traveling.
